meanings.definition: One who offers ideas or recommendations.
meanings.sent1: The suggester at the meeting proposed a new project idea.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a great suggester when it comes to choosing restaurants.
meanings.sent3: The suggester joked that we should all wear pajamas to work.
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like a suggester, constantly generating new concepts.
meanings.sent5: The suggester's advice was like a guiding light in the dark.

meanings.definition: A tool or software that provides suggestions or recommendations.
meanings.sent1: The online suggester helped me find the perfect gift for my mom.
meanings.sent2: I rely on the grammar suggester in my writing software.
meanings.sent3: The suggester on my phone suggested I take a break from screen time.
meanings.sent4: The music suggester on the app introduced me to my new favorite band.
meanings.sent5: The suggester algorithm was like having a personal assistant for shopping.
